name: Percent Riffle for Streams 3%-10% slope
functionStatement: Channel and floodplain structure supply depth, velocity, substrate diversity, and cover to support native organisms through all life stages.
descriptionMarkdown: In-stream habitat structure metric (pools/riffles/wood) indicating habitat diversity and cover for aquatic organisms.
howToMeasureMarkdown: Map riffle and pool units along the reach; compute ratios (pool spacing or pool depth ratio) or percent riffle by length following SQT definitions.
